side               13 data/campaigns/The_Hammer_of_Thursagan/lua/spawns.lua 	local side = cfg.side or helper.wml_error("[spawn_units] missing required side= attribute.")
side               26 data/campaigns/The_Hammer_of_Thursagan/lua/spawns.lua 		wml_actions.move_unit_fake({x = string.format("%d,%d", x, locs[loc_i][1]) , y = string.format("%d,%d", y, locs[loc_i][2]) , type = unit_type , side = side})
side               27 data/campaigns/The_Hammer_of_Thursagan/lua/spawns.lua 		wesnoth.put_unit({ type = unit_type , side = side, random_traits = "yes", generate_name = "yes" , upkeep = "loyal" }, locs[loc_i][1], locs[loc_i][2])
